captions.text:
Man, what is going on with Bruce Willis these
days?

Its sad, isnt it?
Its like he’s sleepwalking. Good Day to

Die Hard is, like, the worst Die Hard movie
ever.

No. Good Day To Die Hard is not a Die Hard
movie. If the original Die Hard is Wrath of

Khan, then Good Day to Die Hard is The Voyage
Home. Alright? Its not even close. Olympus

Has Fallen is more of a Die Hard movie than
Good Day to Die Hard.

No, Olympus Has Fallen is Die Hard. Like,
literally. Beat for beat. They just changed

the setting and most of the actors. Otherwise,
same movie.

Good Day to Die Hard wouldnt even have made
a good Taken sequel, man. Thats how lazy it

is.
Im on vacation!

Right. Lets cram a catch phrase in because
Die Hard movies are supposed to have quotable

lines, right?
But its a lame catch phrase. Thats what really

bothers me.
Right. It’s not even accurate. Like, hes

in Russia to get his son out of prison. Thats,
like, the opposite of vacation. Right?

Yeah.
Wait, did we just agree on something?

Yeah. Its blowing my mind. Feels weird, doesn’t
it?

Well, its the first time you’ve been right
about something. I imagine that would feel

weird, or strange.
All Im saying is Bruce Willis is making either

terrible movies these days, or just doing
walk-on cameos in terrible movies. Alright,

GI Joe Retaliation, you have both Expendables
movies, you’ve got Surrogates. The list

goes on--
Looper.

Dude, Looper is great! Im telling you. Ive
told you that several times.

Well, I wouldnt know. Somebody wont let me
watch it.

Cop Out.
Man, don’t even get me started on Cop Out.

Why?
Kevin Smith, man. I f*cking hate that guy.

Dude, I know Cop Out is not great, but Chasing
Amy is great. Jay & Silent Bob still makes

me laugh. You dont like Kevin Smith movies?
I didnt say anything about his movies, man.

I hate him.
Dude, how can you hate Kevin Smith, man? He

makes funny movies, gives awesome talks, hes
got, like, a trillion kick-ass podcasts.

Podcasts. 2003 called. They want their cutting
edge media format back.

Well, now thats just an ignorant statement,
man. Podcasts has never been more popular.

Well, maybe if we wasnt doing so many f*cking
podcasts he would have time to answer my fan

mail.
You sent him fan mail? What did you send him?

I sent him a picture I wanted him to sign.
Well, what was the picture of?

Me.
You sent a famous actor and movie director

a picture of yourself and asked him to sign
it and you are surprised that he didnt do

it?
Not surprised… vengeful. Ive been plotting

my revenge ever since. Can you get this? I
cant get this.

Well, all Im saying is… people usually get
autographs from the star—

Exactly. Can you imagine how rare it would
be? Think about what Im gonna be able to sell

this thing for. Alright, nobody on the planet
has a picture of me autographed by Kevin Smith.

Well, rarity is only good enough when youve
got demand.

People have to want the thing that youre trying
to sell, alright? I could put a jar of my

own crap on Ebay and call it a one-of-a-kind
item. And that may very well be true. But

that doesnt mean anybodys gonna buy it.
I think you underestimate the kind of people

that hang out on the Internet.. Somebody would
totally buy that. But I also think you underestimate

people who like my videos. They might want
a photo of me. I dont want to brag or anything,

but have you seen the YouTube stats? We have
got, like, tons of subscribers now.

You only got most of those subscribers because
Kevin Smith tweeted about you in the early

going!
Well, I know. Thats all well and good. But

if he thinks thats gonna square things for
his sins against me personally, well, hes

got another thing coming.
Well, Im just saying people dont like your

channel because of your looks. And they dont
want pictures of you autographed by Kevin

Smith, alright? Thats not what they want.
Well, I cant sell that anyway. At least not

until I get it.
You are never gonna get it.

Thank you, En Vogue.
Heres your damn toy.

How did you do that?
Youve gotta look at the packaging, buddy.

This is for big kids. 5 and up.
You know what? F*ck your face. Im out of here.

Do you want me to autograph a picture of you?
Probably worth as much money.

title: A Good Day To Die Hard, Bruce Willis, & Kevin Smith - Conversations With Myself About Movies
